function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Extending working hours of university buildings increases HVAC energy consumption and occupant presence, impacting COVID-19 transmission.","Impact":"Higher energy consumption and increased risk of COVID-19 transmission due to extended occupant presence.","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient HVAC systems and ventilation, and maintain strict hygiene and distancing measures to reduce COVID-19 transmission.","Technologies":"Energy-efficient HVAC systems, advanced ventilation systems, automated occupancy monitoring and control systems.","People":"Occupants, staff, students, visitors","Owner":"University administration, building management"}]}
